thread.title: Komets beat Evansville for second straight night
thread.title_full: Komets beat Evansville for second straight night

title: Komets beat Evansville for second straight night
text:
Komets beat Evansville for second straight night 
By WISE Web Sports Fort Wayne Komets October 10, 2015 Updated Oct 10, 2015 at 10:56 PM EDT 
(Fort Wayne, Indiana) -- The Fort Wayne Komets wrapped up ECHL pre - season play with a 6 - 2 victory over Evansville Saturday night at Memorial Coliseum. Garrett Meurs led the K's attack with two goals while Shawn Szydlowski, Brock Montgomery, Mike Embach, and Trevor Cheek also scored for Fort Wayne. The Komets finished 2 - 1 in the pre - season. They open their regular season Friday night in Kalamazoo, then host the K - Wings in their home opener Saturday.   To submit a comment on this article, your email address is required. We respect your privacy and your email will not be visible to others nor will it be added to any email lists. Most Viewed
